biotools.summary: Interactive tool for building, visualizing, and simulating genetic regulatory networks. It is designed around the concept of a developmental network model, and is intended to deal with large scale models with consistency and clarity. It is capable of representing systems that exhibit increasing complexity over time.

bioschemas.name: BioTapestry
